issue.title: QTest console output incomplete with make test ARGS=-VV

content.raw: The console output is reduced when using the `-xml` option to the `qtest` executable (set in [cmake/GazeboTestUtils.cmake](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/6e6665bf4ea289af724c87372e3d8d98c09aeca8/cmake/GazeboTestUtils.cmake?fileviewer=file-view-default#GazeboTestUtils.cmake-111)). Perhaps the xml file can be made available in addition to the console output in jenkins? @\_jrivero_
content.html: The console output is reduced when using the -xml option to the qtest executable (set in cmake/GazeboTestUtils.cmake). Perhaps the xml file can be made available in addition to the console output in jenkins? @_jrivero_
